ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Sean Connery
ygData.msgSnippet: By saying he is a big white polar bear leads me to believe he s a shaman.  That means he s probably not a polar bear all the time.  Do you know hat server he
ygData.messageBody:
By saying he is a big white polar bear leads me to believe he's a shaman.  That means he's probably not a polar bear all the time.  Do you know hat server he is on?  If so you can do cross server chat.  But you have to know when he's on.  If he's on the same server you are you can put him in your friends list.  Also, just a reminder, names like Sean Connery are against the naming policies so there's an off chance if he gets caught, they'll make him change his name or he'll lose his account.   Good luck though.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Kate <blue_eyed_gypsie_04@...>
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 21, 2003 9:29 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Sean Connery

I am trying to find someone and I was wondering if anyone who plays
everquest knows him and can talk to him. His real name is greg and on
EQ he's a big white polar bear named Sean Connery. He's on  pretty
high level I think. If anyone knows his email address or how to talk
to him on everquest please let me know. it is important.



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
